source.name: AOL

facts: It actually works for many people

neutral.headline: Social Security 'rule' often disregarded by Americans, yet beneficial for some
neutral.body_html: Experts label the common practice of early retirement as a mistake. However, millions continue to do so and find it actually works well for them.

conservative.headline: Early Retirement: A Common Mistake Among Americans Despite Experts' Advice
conservative.body_html: Despite experts calling early retirement a mistake, many American workers continue to do so. This practice often works well for them.

liberal.headline: Millions of Americans Find Early Retirement Beneficial Despite Experts' Advice
liberal.body_html: Experts call early retirement a mistake, but many American workers continue to do so and find it actually works well for them. This practice often benefits individuals in various ways.
